casebody.data:
Lottie E. HARRIS, Guardian of Nancy Jane Beck, a Minor, et al. v. EAGLE-PICHER COMPANY, a Corporation. No. 4813. United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. April 21, 1954. W. Rodney Devilliers, Miami, Okl., and J. Paul Jorgensen, Wichita, Kan., for appellants. Wallace, Wallace & Owens, Miami, Okl., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and KNOUS, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed for failure of appellants diligently to prosecute.
